snippet: In his State of the Union address, President Obama will define a second term built around restoring economic prosperity while unveiling education, infrastructure, clean energy and manufacturing initiatives.
abstract: President Obama, in his State of the Union address, will define a second term agenda built around restoring economic prosperity to the middle class, unveiling initiatives in education, infrastructure, clean energy and manufacturing.

byline.original: By MICHAEL D. SHEAR and JACKIE CALMES

lead_paragraph: In his State of the Union address, President Obama will define a second term built around restoring economic prosperity while unveiling education, infrastructure, clean energy and manufacturing initiatives.

headline.seo: In State of the Union Address, Obama Will Lay Out Agenda Focused on the Middle Class
headline.main: In Address, President Will Focus on the Middle Class
headline.print_headline: In Address, President Will Lay Out Agenda Focused on the Middle Class
